channel.title: High alch
channel.description: i need to know the emote and gfx for the high alch spell please... im trying to fix the pimpscape high alch thing where it locks you in position and no one else can see you move[br][size=1]Posted on: March 25, 2007, 12:11:05 AM[/size][hr]can anyone help?

item.title: High alch
item.dc:creator: @lool121 lool121
item.description:
@lool121 wrote:

put thissetSidebarMage();
under playerGfx(113, 0); at the spell that alvaro gaven to u.

if u get errors, search this: public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

then add this under Runnable{

private void setSidebarMage() { try { outStream.createFrame(106); outStream.writeByteC(6); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } catch(Exception E) { sendMessage("Error switching sidebar back to the magic interface!"); } }

have fun with alching!

item.title: High alch
item.dc:creator: @alvaroboldo alvaroboldo
item.description:
@alvaroboldo wrote:

Search For 

else if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch

Select all that Spell And Remplace It With This 

else if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -55) 
{
if(!playerHasItemAmount(561, 10))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(561, 10))
{
alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 3);
deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1);
addItem(995, alchvaluez);
addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[6]), 6);
startAnimation(713);
playerGfx(113, 0);
deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 10);
newAnimDelay = 6;
newAnim = 712;
newAnimRequired = true;
} 
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 21) 
{
sendMessage("You need at least 21 Magic to cast High Level Alchemy");
}
}

Hope That Helped
